titles.title: Electronic Anti-Stalking Act of 1994
To amend section 223 of the Communications Act of 1934 to prevent the harassment by computer modem or other electronic device.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1796)
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 8/21/1994--Introduced. Electronic Anti-Stalking Act of 1994 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to define "telephone" and "telephone call" to include communications by means of computer modem or any other two-way wire or radio telecommunications device for purposes of the prohibition on obscene or harassing telephone calls in the District of Columbia or in interstate or foreign communications.
